alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HARDING COUNTY THROUGH 845 PM MDT... At 759 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of South Cave Hills, or 12 miles northwest of Buffalo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and up to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... South Cave Hills around 805 PM MDT. North Cave Hills around 815 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ludlow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
